title: Which is the best way: buy rune page or buy a champion?
body:
I'm confuse which one to buy because it's hard to save some IP.
please help...
which one?

replies.body:
If you have 3-4 Rune pages you should be fine buying champions otherwise i'd say runes are a MUST BUY.

If you want to save money on runes the only ones you 100% need are:

Marks: AD and Magic Pen
Seals: Health and Armour
Glyphs: Magic Resist
Quints: AD, AP and Attack Speed

All of them except the HP seals and Attack Speed quints are really cheap
